title: Inside One Tech Company’s Attempt to Evacuate Employees From Ukraine - The Wall Street Journal
content: Inside One Tech Company’s Attempt to Evacuate Employees From Ukraine  The Wall Street Journal
description: Fractal Analytics, a New York-based artificial-intelligence company with 81 workers in Ukraine, set up some staff in western Ukraine, helped others leave the country entirely, and offered to pay salaries in advance in the event of a cyberattack or a run on ATMs.
